body_html:
CC @mrry (corrected username)
AFAIK, unless we build python 2.7 from sources using Visual studio 2015 or 2017, it is not possible to build tensorflow with python 2.7.
Therefore, we will not support python 2.7 on windows.
body_text:
CC @mrry (corrected username)
AFAIK, unless we build python 2.7 from sources using Visual studio 2015 or 2017, it is not possible to build tensorflow with python 2.7.
Therefore, we will not support python 2.7 on windows.
body:
CC @mrry (corrected username)
AFAIK, unless we build python 2.7 from sources using Visual studio 2015 or 2017, it is not possible to build tensorflow with python 2.7.
Therefore, we will not support python 2.7 on windows.
